title: Train Service Disruption at Marina Bay Station

title_translations.ms: Gangguan Perkhidmatan Kereta Api di Stesen Marina Bay
title_translations.ta: மெரினா பே நிலையத்தில் ரயில் சேவை தடங்கல்

updates.text: [UPDATE] NSL: Free bus service between Marina Bay and Marina South Pier has ceased.
[UPDATE] Train service between Marina Bay and Marina South Pier has resumed. Free bus service is still available.
Due to train fault at Marina Bay station, there is no train service between MRB and MSP.Train service between MRB and JUR running normally.
